thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com | 4 of 457
thread.title: Jana Tullis-Raphael

author: Jana Tullis-Raphael
title: Jana Tullis-Raphael
text: My sales rep Nicole Joseph was A1 and on point every step of the way. She showed us around and showed us a vehicle that I really liked. It was no longer available when we came back to purchase, which was no fault of hers. She went above and beyond the call of duty and got us a SUV from another location. She knew I was in a time crunch so she did her best to make sure I was accommodated.
